attributes.action: More awareness signage & campaigning for all motorists, cyclists & pedestrians
attributes.background:
Recent deadly road accidents have led to a stream of abuse towards various road users. All road users must act responsibly & not hide behind road rules. 
We need increased signs/awareness campaigns to protect all road users i.e. "Look out for cyclists/pedestrians", improve cycle lanes, etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Some of the actions you've asked for aren't the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. For example, improving cycle lanes on local roads would be the responsibility of the local council.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
